title: Font from Wendy's recent marketing
content:
Hi,

I was wondering if anyone might know what the font in the following image might be. It's being used in Wendy's recent marketing materials.

[http://i26.tinypic.com/2mzk31t.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415223923/http:/i26.tinypic.com/2mzk31t.gif "http://i26.tinypic.com/2mzk31t.gif")

Thanks,  
OT
author: Odd Thomas

comments.content:
we've had this one before: Neutraface Text Bold Italic

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415223923/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18")

Thanks! You guys rock!

Best Regards,  
OT
